title: Donate
content:
Wow! Thanks for wanting to help The Caregiver Act become a reality. We truly appreciate it.\
\
***[Click here](https://buy.stripe.com/test_8wM8AmcS66Xz2QM001)*** to give us $2.00.\
\
What it goes towards:

* Operation costs, primarily letters to representatives.
subtitle: Sorry about the extra click!
